name: Amazing New Block Puzzle
description:
Amazing New Block Puzzle is the hardest block puzzle game!
As long as you tap sideways or vertically and connected into a line can be eliminated and got scores. This game is amazing block and brings brand new game experience to classic puzzle block games.
This addictive game makes for great brain training and offers hours of retro games fun for fans of hard puzzle games and mind games alike!
FEATURES
• Simple rules and Easy control
• Various blocks and stunning graphic
• Smooth and delicate animation
• Funny sound effects
• Hours of fun, exciting play
